attributes.action: Sanction Boris Johnson for his statement re historic child abuse investigations.
attributes.background: In a recent radio interview Boris Johnson suggested that spending police time on historic investigations was a ‘Malarky’, claiming the money spent on historic child abuse investigations was ’spaffed’ up a wall. This is grossly offensive to victims & survivors & should be addressed by parliament.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments. This includes calling for MPs to be sacked.
